name: Angry Dude Simulator
description:
Extremely funny open world game.
Beat other dude all over world and earn cash.
Discover town to find food and water.
You can do whatever you want in Angry Dude Simulator.
But remember to escape from Police.


You can reach us for any questions or problems on help@zuuks.com
